Вообще не цепляет, игра на пару часиков...
Nice game, I really like, the only problem is that silvers play like golds two year ago.

It's a fun first person shooter game and I like it.

Pro's:
- Fun for everyone, good and bad.
- Season passes.
- Skins (also a con ngl)
- Doesn't require a good pc.
- Fun game modes.
- FREE! For the most part.


Con's:
- There isn't always a season pass.
- Skins can cost a lot of money, don't get addicted. They aren't free or are very hard to get.
- Cases, they can be addictive and you can't open cases in the Netherlands and Belgium even if earned through playing and not buying.

I think it's a really fun game, but it's not for everyone. I think everyone should at least try it, it is free after all. If you like Rainbow Six Siege this is definetly something for you.
